transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji

Executive: Ji mai shivshakti travel limited se vijay singh baat kar raha hu.

Customer: Ji ji sir bataiye.

Executive: Mam mere ko ek customers ke against complaint karani hai wo humse illegal tarike se dawa mang rahe the.

Customer: Thik hai.

Executive: Bina drug license ke humse dawa mang rahe the control substance ka aur jab humne unse manga aur unse puchne ki koshish ki to unhone call hang up kar diya.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: To mai unka naam bata raha hu aap hamari profile abhi aap usme manjith mishra karke hai ye baliya se hai.

Customer: Actually aapne wo buylead ke through liya tha sir ya direct enquiry thi aapke pass?

Executive: Direct direct humko call aayi hai domestic call aayi hai.

Customer: Call aayi hui hai.

Executive: Aap check kar sakte hai. ha ji ji actually lekin aapke call band kar de mam kyuki aapke yaha jitne bhi aapke user hote hai.

Executive: Wo sab illegal dawa mangte hai.

Customer: Domestic wale.

Executive: Bina drug license ke ha domestic wale.

Customer: To aap chahte hai sir call band karna agar is tarike ki calls aa rahi hai to I would suggest ki band kar dijiye.

Executive: Nahi mam is tarike ke call jisme customers bhi rehte hai jo genuine customer hai lekin hamara farz ye hai ki agar humse koi illegal tarike se mang raha hai to hum aapke yaha complaint karke unki profile ko deactivate karaye right.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: To abhi mere pass na ji ji mujhe thode se aapke details vagera chahiye hongi but abhi.

Customer: Abhi mai aapko agar batau to aapka jo ye access hota hai catalog ka wo mere pass hota nahi hai thik hai.

Customer: To aap chaho to aap whatsapp ya mail ke through mujhe wo details bhej sakte ho so that mai uske aage further aapko communication platform thodi hota hai official communication aap email pe share karo email pe share karo mai aapko apni email id de rahi hu.

Executive: To matlab aise call pe complaint karenge to nahi ho sakta.

Customer: Nahi bilkul hoga sir aisa nahi hai thodi si details chahiye hongi ki buyer kaun sa hai.

Executive: Kar le mai bata raha hu manjith mishra hai abhi abhi just humko enquiry aayi hai ki aap hamari profile me itna bhi nahi check kar sakte.

Customer: Sir actually account ka access nahi hota hamare pass.

Executive: To mam aapke pass kis chiz ka access hota hai.

Customer: Sir hum aapka personal detail nahi de sakte na customer ka.

Executive: Parvez parvez alam ko janti hongi waha pe.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Ji hum aapke office bhi aaye hue hai hum baki logo se mile bhi hue hai humne aapka pura CMS panel bhi dekha hua hai to aap hame ye na bataye ki kya access hota hai kya nahi hota hai.

Executive: Mai industry me bhi chala raha hai.

Customer: Ha I know.

Executive: Agar hum complaint kar rahe hai ji koi customer agar humse gair sanvaidhanik tarike se humse baat kar raha hai koi medication ask kar raha hai to mera farz dayitv banta hai ki hum us chiz ko bataye.

Customer: Ha bilkul banta hai sir mai aapki complaint.

Executive: Aapka involvement hai in sab chizo me.

Customer: Nahi hamara involvement nahi hota sir hum to employee hai hum yaha work karte hai aap aap employee ho right.

Executive: To aap se jo customers bolega aap uska resolution doge.

Customer: Ha bilkul mai resolution dungi sir.

Executive: Ha to please give me the resolution mam.

Customer: Aap mujhe customer ki details bataiye aap unka naam bata dijiye.

Executive: Bataiye.

Executive: Customers ka naam hai manjith mishra.

Customer: Mishra.

Executive: Ha.

Customer: Unka contact number de sakte hai?

Executive: Contact number likhiye 63060

Customer: 63060

Executive: 09477

Customer: 09477 thik hai sir okay.

Executive: Mai ye bata de raha hu ha bataiye manjith mishra 8115@gmail.com.

Customer: Mishra 8115@gmail.com.

Customer: Thik hai mai ye aage forward kar de rahi hu sir.

Executive: Please mam forward kar dijiye ise.

Customer: Thik hai aur call waise bhi aapki recorded hai to sari chize hai.

Executive: Wo aisa koi mai aapke yaha bahut sari chize rehti hai lekin aap log kabhi action nahi lete aapke yaha bina drug license ke bhi log kam karte hai.

Customer: Ji mai mai update kar deti hu aage sir apne seniors ko.

Executive: Warna fir mam loop me rakh ke e code ko loop me rakh ke mai kar dunga ye dhyan rakhiyega.

Customer: Sir mujhe ek bar ispe thoda sa discuss karne dijiye un logo se aage forward kare to mujhe bataye kya aapke liye.

Executive: Whatever you can and just update me sir thank you.

Customer: Definitely sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received illegal medicine requests.

- Wants action against the user.



Resolution:

- Executive provided customer details and email.

- Executive will forward details to seniors.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to be updated after internal discussion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- illegal requests, complaint, profile deactivation, details
